EasyPQP
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which EasyPQP installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using EasyPQP, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load EasyPQP/0.1.53-foss-2024a
```
